funding-source.institution: Fondo para la Investigación Científica y Tecnológica (AR)

funding-group.funding-statement: C.V.F. and D.E.A. are members of the Argentinean Council of Investigation (CONICET). This work was supported by a grant from the Agencia Nacional de Promoción Científica y Tecnológica awarded to C.V.F. (PICT-201-0001) and by the French Government's Investissement d'Avenir program, Laboratoire d'Excellence Integrative Biology of Emerging Infectious Diseases awarded to M.C.S. (ANR-10-LABX-62-IBEID). URL of funders websites: http://www.agencia.mincyt.gob.ar/frontend/agencia/instrumento/24 http://www.agence-nationale-recherche.fr/ The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
